title: MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Premium v.14.0.0.183 Cracked
description:
MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Premium v.14.0.0.183

The Premium version offers advanced users complete functionality, new features, and a unique package consisting of three exclusive programs from Red Giant. Whether lighting effects with Chromatic Glow, light reflections with Knoll Light Factory or retro film looks with Retrograde, you have plenty of high-quality special effects at your disposal to make your movies stand out.

The Premium Package. For more creative freedom.
- Experience your videos as if for the first time: Every year we select the best effects packages in the world for our Premium version.
- MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Premium gives you a unique selection of high-quality plug-ins for professional video effects.

1. Edit videos
A total of 99 customizable multimedia tracks give you complete freedom to arrange and optimize complex projects quickly and easily.

2. Mix 5.1 sound
Experience sound like never before. Mix your audio tracks for your 5.1 system and enjoy movie theater-like surround sound in the comfort of your own home.

3. Custom interface
With MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2015 Premium you can customize the interface by moving, scaling or removing toolbars and windows.




Recommended System Requirements:

- For Microsoft Windows 7 | 8 | 8.1, 64-bit systems
* System requirements for 4K/HD editing:
- Processor: Quad-core processor with 2.8 GHz or better
- RAM: 4 GB
- Graphics card: Dedicated, at least 512 MB VRAM
* System requirements for 3D editing:
- Red/cyan glasses required for anaglyph 3D display
- A special monitor is needed for viewing with polarized filter glasses
- A 120 Hz monitor or a projector as well as compatible shutter glasses and graphics card are required for shutter playback



Installation:

1. Unpack and install the program. (Disabling your network is recommended before install.)
2. Don't launch the app. Replace the fixed exe to default dir.
3. Replace the fixed Protein.dll in Protein folder, confirm replacing obviously.
4. Add the following lines to your hosts file: (Located in WindowsSystem32driversetchosts)

- 127.0.0.1 www.magix.com
- 127.0.0.1 195.214.216.16

5. Now, launch the program, when you get activation pop up click on "Exit The Program"
6. When you re-launch it, your license will be recognized.
7. Install the provided update offline to complete.

Quick Note:
- Mpeg-2 codec needs additional activation, which doesn't exist yet. Sorry
